mainText:
I was not always Steve's Jobs' fan, pushing any jealousy aside.  Sometimes I
resented his assertion  that his way was the only way, even if he was
significantly correct.

 

If not for Mr. Jobs, computing would have remained a stodgy magic of
technical wizards, or worse, the control mechanism for big business.
Instead he brought technology into the light, and when it was seen, it was
beautiful, useful, and utterly appealing.

 

I can only hope that his legacy can be continued with his departure, as
Humanity was better for his contribution.

 

So long Steve Jobs and thanks for making the world a better place.
header: Steve Jobs Was the Right Brain of Technology
author: Harrison
